亊字的基本解释

亊
shì
古同“事”。

亊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》鉏吏切，去志，崇。］
亦作“亊1”。“叓1”的今字。“士2”的被通假字。
(1)官职。
(2)引申为职守、职权、责任。
(3)职业。
(4)事情，指人类生活中的一切活动和所遇到的一切现象。
(5)指天子、诸侯的国家大事，如祭祀、盟会、兵戎等。
(6)特指对外族进行战争。
(7)事业；功业。
(8)才能。
(9)变故；事故。
(10)物件，东西。
(11)典故。
(12)景物；景致。
(13)侍奉；供奉。
(14)指养育。
(15)谓从师求学。
(16)谓出嫁。
(17)实践；从事。
(18)治理；任事。
(19)使用；役使。
(20)勤劳，劳苦。
(21)犹止，仅。
(22)量词。件。
(23)通“士”。
[②]［zì］
［《廣韻》側吏切，去志，莊。］
亦作“亊1”。通“倳1”。通“剚1”。
(1)立置。
(2)插入，刺入。参见“事2刃”。

亊字的康熙字典解释
亊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
亊字的起名意思

暂无。

亊
Basic explanation of words
亊
shì
The ancient same "thing".
亊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guang Yun" 鉏琏吏吏開, go to Zhi, Chong. ]
Also known as "Qi 1". The present character of "叓1". "士2" was passed falsely.
(1) Official position.
(2) The extension is duty, authority, and responsibility.
(3) Occupation.
(4) Things refer to all activities and all phenomena encountered in human life.
(5) Refers to the national affairs of the emperor and the princes, such as sacrifices, alliances, soldiers, etc.
(6) Especially referring to wars against foreign races.
(7) Career; meritorious deeds.
(8) Talent.
(9) Changes; accidents.
(10) Objects, things.
(11) Allusions.
(12) Scenery; Scenery.
(13) Serve; worship.
(14) Refers to nurturing.
(15) It is said to learn from a teacher.
(16) Said to be married.
(17) Practice; engage in.
(18) Governance; service.
(19) Use; Serving.
(20) Hard work, hard work.
(21) Still, only.
(22) Quantifiers. Pieces.
(23) Pass "Taxi".
[②]［zì］
["Guangyun" side officials cut, go to Zhi, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "Qi 1". Same as "倳1". Linked with "剚1".
(1) Standing position.
(2) Insertion, penetration. See "Things 2 Blades".
亊
